page.title: 19Winchfield Area - Media.
page.content: National & International news is obtained through the usual sources - newspapers, radio, TV & the TV Teletext service. The area sometimes features on{Local Radio}( 'County Sound' or '210'). Local news is rep- orted through the two main newspapers, {'Basingstoke Gazette'}with its Friday & Monday issues & the rival newspaper {'Fleet News'}(the block falls between the distribution areas).{'The Hart {Observer'}covers the area extremely well & has only been launched this year. The{Parish Magazine,}aptly named CONTACT, gives details of local activities, Church Services, outings etc. & is published monthly - this covers the entire block. The Hartley Wintney Preservation Society produces a bi-annual publication,{'The {Hartley Row Journal'}that sometimes mentions the Winchfield area.
